biotools.summary: CoExp Webpage is a web platform that enables the exploitation of co-expression networks. CoExp currently offers 109 co-expression models focused on brain transcriptomics with plans to expand its scope. It is a powerful, easy to use and innovative tool for gene set annotation across a variety of brain specific transcriptomicdata sets. CoExp makes co-expression models visually manageable, accessible and easily exploitable to the scientific community.
